data.title: Barba and Varley - School of Education
data.meta_description: The School of Education, TCD, in collaboration with the Departments of German and Theatre, UCC, is hosting an evening at Trinity College Dublin's Samuel Beckett Theatre on May 10, 2024, at 7:30 PM.
data.text:
This event is part of the Scenario conference, Presence in Performative Language Teaching, Learning and Research, organised by the School of Education, TCD and the Departments of German & Theatre, UCC. Tickets for the event are sold as part of the conference registration. Choose the option Eugenio Barba in Dublin to purchase a ticket for this event only.

Eugenio Barba & Julia Varley – Odin Teatr – Trinity College Dublin, 10/05/2024

The School of Education, TCD, in collaboration with the Departments of German and Theatre, UCC, is hosting an evening at Trinity College Dublin's Samuel Beckett Theatre on May 10, 2024, at 7:30 PM, to celebrate the remarkable 60-year journey of Odin Teatr with Eugenio Barba and Julia Varley. Witness Eugenio Barba's discourse on theatre anthropology and pre-expressivity, followed by Julia Varley’s session on harnessing the power of body and voice to intensify stage presence.

Programme:

19.30-20:00 Eugenio Barba: Theatre anthropology and pre-expressivity

20-20.30 Varley: Body and voice: Principles of intensifying stage presence

20:30-21: Q&A with E. Barba and J. Varley, moderated by Prof. Nicholas Johnson

Admission: €35, via Eventbrite, here.

Limited tickets available. Sales close 05/05/2024

*This event is part of the Scenario conference, Presence in Performative Language Teaching, Learning and Research, organised by the School of Education, TCD and the Departments of German & Theatre, UCC. Tickets for the event are sold as part of the conference registration. Choose the option Eugenio Barba in Dublin to purchase a ticket for this event only.
